body_html:
@soumith In the CUDA 9.2 directory I have

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib64/ | grep nccl
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 12 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so -> libnccl.so.2
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 17 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so.2 -> libnccl.so.2.2.12
-rwxrwxr-x. 1 root root 75855648 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so.2.2.12
-rw-rw-r--. 1 root root 80894904 May 14 23:10 libnccl_static.a

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/include/ | grep nccl
-rw-rw-r--. 1 root root 9443 May 14 23:05 nccl.h

#define NCCL_MAJOR 2
#define NCCL_MINOR 2
#define NCCL_PATCH 12
#define NCCL_SUFFIX ""

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/include/  | grep nccl

#define NCCL_MAJOR 2

body:
@soumith In the CUDA 9.2 directory I have 

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/lib64/  | grep nccl
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root        12 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so -> libnccl.so.2
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root        17 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so.2 -> libnccl.so.2.2.12
-rwxrwxr-x. 1 root root  75855648 May 14 23:10 libnccl.so.2.2.12
-rw-rw-r--. 1 root root  80894904 May 14 23:10 libnccl_static.a

$ ls -l /usr/local/cuda/include/  | grep nccl
-rw-rw-r--. 1 root root     9443 May 14 23:05 nccl.h

#define NCCL_MAJOR 2
#define NCCL_MINOR 2
#define NCCL_PATCH 12
#define NCCL_SUFFIX ""
